data.eml:eml: Eight new species and two new records of Batriscenellus Jeannel (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Pselaphinae) from China and India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yin, Zi-Wei (2017): Eight new species and two new records of Batriscenellus Jeannel (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Pselaphinae) from China and India. Zootaxa 4318 (3): 561-575, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4318.3.8
